text: Pulaski is a village in the Brown, Oconto, and Shawano counties of the state of Wisconsin in the United States. 3,870 people were living in Pulaski as of the 2020 census. The parts of Pulaski that are in the Oconto and Brown Counties are part of the Green Bay metropolitan area. Pulaski has an area of 2.9 square miles, says the United States Census Bureau. ==References== ==Other websites== *Pulaski Chamber of Commerce Category:Villages in Wisconsin Category:Brown County, Wisconsin Category:Oconto County, Wisconsin Category:Shawano County, Wisconsin
title: Pulaski, Wisconsin
